# zabbix_host_group (Resource)

Manages a Zabbix host group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a host group for Linux servers
resource "zabbix_host_group" "linux" {
  name = "Linux servers"
}

# Create a host group for web servers
resource "zabbix_host_group" "web" {
  name = "Web servers"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the host group.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the host group (groupid in Zabbix).
- `uuid` (String) The universally unique identifier of the host group.
